meanings.sent1: She spent the afternoon repolishing her favorite necklace.
meanings.sent2: After the rain, he repolished his shoes to make them shine.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to help by repolishing the mirror with its tail.
meanings.sent4: The artist repolished his masterpiece until it gleamed like new.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays repolished the surface of the lake, creating a dazzling reflection.

meanings.definition: The act of polishing something again.
meanings.sent1: The repolishing of the antique table brought out its original beauty.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the repolishing of the car made it look brand new.
meanings.sent3: The repolishing of the trophy made it sparkle like a diamond.
meanings.sent4: The repolishing of the silverware revealed intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The repolishing of the floor made it so shiny, you could see your reflection in it.
